hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -xe # This is the job which checks out devstack-gate if [[ ! -d devstack-gate ]]; then echo "Cloning devstack-gate" git clone https://github.com/jerryz1982/devstack-gate else echo "Fixing devstack-gate git remotes" cd devstack-gate git remote set-url origin https://github.com/jerryz1982/devstack-gate git remote update git reset --hard if ! git clean -x -f ; then sleep 1 git clean -x -f fi git checkout master git reset --hard remotes/origin/master if ! git clean -x -f ; then sleep 1 git clean -x -f fi cd .. fi
# Switch to forked devstack juno if [[ ! -d /opt/git/openstack-dev/devstack ]]; then echo "Cloning devstack-gate" sudo git clone https://github.com/jerryz1982/devstack else echo "Fixing devstack git remotes" cd /opt/git/openstack-dev/devstack sudo git remote set-url origin https://github.com/jerryz1982/devstack sudo git remote update sudo git reset --hard if ! sudo git clean -x -f ; then sleep 1 sudo git clean -x -f fi sudo git checkout stable/juno_multinode sudo git reset --hard remotes/origin/stable/juno_multinode if ! sudo git clean -x -f ; then sleep 1 sudo git clean -x -f fi cd $WORKSPACE fi sudo rm -rf $WORKSPACE/logs /opt/stack/logs

#!/bin/bash -ex # Clean FortiGate configuration ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -tt admin@10.160.38.95 << 'EOF' config global execute restore config ftp jerryzhao/full_config_95 ftp.fortinet.com myfortinet a11a11 y EOF # ping -c 6 -i 30 10.160.38.95 || exit $?
if [ "$GERRIT_PROJECT" == "neutron" ]; then export ZUUL_PROJECT=$GERRIT_PROJECT export ZUUL_URL=http://$GERRIT_HOST:8080 export ZUUL_BRANCH=$GERRIT_BRANCH export ZUUL_REF=$GERRIT_REFSPEC export NEUTRON_BRANCH=$GERRIT_REFSPEC else export OVERRIDE_ZUUL_BRANCH=stable/juno export NEUTRON_BRANCH=stable/juno fi
# Setup environment variables for FortiGate driver test export OVERRIDE_DEVSTACK_PROJECT_BRANCH=stable/juno_multinode export OVERRIDE_REQUIREMENTS_PROJECT_BRANCH=test_fortinet export DEVSTACK_GATE_NEUTRON=1 DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG="" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_USE_DEBUG_COMMAND=False;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="RECLONE=True;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_PLUGIN=fortinet;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_FORTINET_PLUGIN_FG_IP=10.160.38.95;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_FORTINET_PLUGIN_FG_INT_INF=port24;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_FORTINET_PLUGIN_FG_EXT_INF=port32;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_FORTINET_PLUGIN_FG_TENANT_NET_TYPE=vlan;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_FORTINET_TENANT_INTERFACE=eth1;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="NEUTRON_REPO=http://10.160.5.251:8080/neutron.git;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="NEUTRON_BRANCH=$NEUTRON_BRANCH;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="REQUIREMENTS_REPO=http://github.com/jerryz1982/requirements.git;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="REQUIREMENTS_BRANCH=test_fortinet;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="TEMPEST_REPO=http://github.com/jerryz1982/tempest.git;" # TODO: change tempest temporarily to add dhcp rule and ping timeout to workaround fgt plugin bugs. DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="TEMPEST_BRANCH=add_dhcp_secgrouprule;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="ML2_L3_PLUGIN=router_fortinet;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_ML2_PLUGIN_MECHANISM_DRIVERS='openvswitch,fortinet';" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_ML2_PLUGIN_VLAN_TYPE_OPTIONS='network_vlan_ranges=physnet1:1009:1099';" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_ML2_PLUGIN_TYPE_DRIVERS=local,flat,vlan,gre,vxlan;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_ML2_TENANT_NETWORK_TYPE=vlan;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="PROVIDER_NETWORK_TYPE=vlan;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_USE_PROVIDER_NETWORKING=True;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_L3_ENABLED=True;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_L3_ROUTER_PER_TENANT=True;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="ENABLE_TENANT_VLANS=True;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="TENANT_VLAN_RANGE=1009:1099;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="PHYSICAL_NETWORK=physnet1;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="OVS_PHYSICAL_BRIDGE=br-eth1;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="PUBLIC_INTERFACE=eth1;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_FLOATING_ALLOCATION_POOL=start=10.160.38.201,end=10.160.38.219;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="FLOATING_RANGE=10.160.38.1/24;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="PUBLIC_NETWORK_GATEWAY=10.160.38.1;" DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_USE_DEBUG_COMMAND=False;" # TODO: disable FTM to bypass dhcp offer issue #DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="Q_USE_SECGROUP=False;" export DEVSTACK_LOCAL_CONFIG+="HOST_IP_IFACE=eth0" export OVERRIDE_ENABLED_SERVICES=horizon,q-svc,q-agt,key,g-api,g-reg,n-api,n-crt,n-obj,n-cpu,n-cond,n-sch,n-xvnc,n-cauth,rabbit,tempest,mysql export DEVSTACK_GATE_TEMPEST=1 export DEVSTACK_GATE_TIMEOUT=120 export TEMPEST_CONCURRENCY=1 export DEVSTACK_GATE_TEMPEST_REGEX="tempest.api.network.test_networks_negative \ tempest.api.network.test_networks.NetworksTest \ tempest.scenario.test_network_basic_ops.TestNetworkBasicOps.test_network_basic_ops \ tempest.scenario.test_network_basic_ops.TestNetworkBasicOps.test_connectivity_between_vms_on_different_networks \ tempest.scenario.test_network_basic_ops.TestNetworkBasicOps.test_hotplug_nic \ tempest.scenario.test_network_basic_ops.TestNetworkBasicOps.test_update_instance_port_admin_state \ tempest.scenario.test_network_advanced_server_ops.TestNetworkAdvancedServerOps"
echo "Copying devstack-vm-gate-wrap.sh" cp devstack-gate/devstack-vm-gate-wrap.sh ./safe-devstack-vm-gate-wrap.sh echo "Running safe-devstack-vm-gate-wrap.sh" ./safe-devstack-vm-gate-wrap.sh # Save the return value so we can exit with this DGRET=$?
